heading: Hello
paragraphs: Pradeep Singh in an experienced software engineer who is always open for consulting or employment opportunities. Currently, Mr. Singh works with a leading online travel agency (OTA) developing new features and maintaining backend functions on their sites. There, he trains co-workers and clients in software development, development methodologies, and the latest trends and core programming concepts.

Mr. Singh also works on some independent projects, most recent a blockchain data-sharing concept siteâ€“in in the past, internet-of-things (IOT), Raspberry pi, and several other challenging projects, including machine learning, blogging, and blockchain technology.

He is active on social media including LinkedIn, Facebook, and Instagram. Having lived and worked in India, and now Thailand, and interacted with stakeholders worldwide, Singh is able to interact with diverse internal and external customers.
